<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Keep Pace](/Feats.aspx?ID=6284) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 191 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Bounty Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=243)

**Prerequisites**
[Bounty Hunter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6281)

**Trigger**
Your prey is within reach and attempts to [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=658) away from you.

</column>

---

Once you are upon your prey, they can’t escape. [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=2305) up to your Speed, following the foe and keeping it in reach throughout its movement until it stops moving or you’ve moved your full Speed. You can use Keep Pace to [Burrow](/Actions.aspx?ID=2310), [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=2374), [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=2312), or [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=2381) instead of Stride if you have the corresponding movement type.
name: Keep Pace
